name: Lightcurve
body:
### Lightcurve.
Tool for creating lightcurves from time-tag data!

```
>>> from lightcurve import LightCurve 
>>> data = LightCurve.extract_from_cos( 'rootname_corrtag_a.fits' )
```

### Overview
